column4: http://imagebin.org/118427 can someone help be solve this colour problem
what problem?
the colors are not the same which usually doesnt happen, is it possible to change the indicator applet color to match the panel, i notice its only with some themes it will do this
theres two colors in that panel, two shades of gray, it stands out too much to me and i want to make them the same
nope, just when to customize theme and it seems to do that to quite a couple, one has the applet orange while the panel is white, i dont get it
tried but no luck
indicator applet and indicator applet session
yes
this issue only happens to me when using Ambiance or Radiance.
yea i would kinda be bumbed if i couldnt use a theme bc of this, and i try changing the windows color and the applet color changes with it
its quite annoying right?
yea gksu nautilus /usr/share/themes
could u be using the theme
may i pm u
i have a work around for that color issue
What have you found?

sudo apt-get install gcolor2 , take a sample of what color you want the panel to be, right click panel->properties-> background-> choose solid color _. and enter in your color code that gcolor gives you
oh and turn the opaque all the way to the right
I know, we should submit the bug
